body.name: GTPLAYER Gaming Chair, Computer Chair with Footrest and Lumbar Support, Height Adjustable Game Chair with 360°-Swivel Seat and Headrest and for Office or Gaming (Faux Leather, Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23. Order within 2 hrs 24 mins
features: Most Comfortable And Relaxing: Equipped with headrest and massage lumbar pillow.When your neck feels sore from gaming or working with head down for a long time,the headrest will relieve your fatigue.When tired from maintaining a same sitting posture,please rest assured to lean back and charge your waist pillow,it will relax your tired waist energetically.

More Stable Than Others: Common gaming chairs are equipped with plastic legs generally to save costs,but we still insist on applying the same material as the built-in metal frame.No fear of high or low temperature,no fear of the sunshine, no fear of wind, it will not rust and break.Whether child rolls on the chair or a pet jumps up excitedly, the sturdy metal legs will keep the chair stable firmly.

Liberate Your Feet: Will you feel tired for sitting all the time?Sure.Then you can choose the chair with footrest to relax your feet.When you don’t want to straighten your back and sit,just take out the footrest,put your feet up,turn on your favorite music,and start enjoying the comfort!And don’t worry about clean,it is also made of high-quality PU leather,just wipe it with a soft cloth and it will shine as new.

Reject Short-Lived Chairs: We never hesitate to apply materials.Armrests must be padded from the position of the elbow to the wrist,built-in metal frame must be wider,and the foam under the leather must be rich,it can’t collapse as if we are sitting on a hard stone when leaning up.The chair has gone through thousands of rotation and sitting experiments before mass production.Sufficient and premium materials can ensure the chair to withstand long-term use.Height:49.21”-53.15”, Diameter:27.56”.

Worry-Free Purchase: A detailed instruction will be sent to you along with all accessories so that you can assemble the chair easily.Free replacement or refund within 30 days.Free replacement or repair within 1 year.If you have any questions or suggestions,please feel free to contact us,we will do our best to make our customers satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One person assemble
reviews.reviewText: Love it. I'm not good at asymbeling and this was super easy. Just do one step At a time and read the notes per step. Last gamer chair I had was a titan secret lab and this was as comfy as that. The armbars don't move but that wasn't a problem for me.the footrest is just a easy sliding bar that doesn't really extend to far but still worked for me. The headrest is OK but is not luxury comfort. Having said all that for the money and ease of setup it's a great deal for under $200. The chair is really comfortable the recliner steadily stops at several recline positions. If you knew what you were doing 100 percent you could set this chair up I'm 10 minutes but with reading it's probably a 40 minute setup. When you connect the top to the bottom there is a slot at the bottom the top fits in so you can easily screw the screws in with one person. No extra tools required or needed. While it's not premium luxury it is a really really comfortable chair and even has a massager that uses USB. Its not super strong but it does a good job. Only complaint it's a little loud but not deafening. If your looking to spend under 200 and need a one person setup I highly recommend this chair! Delivery was also fast! It's a little intimidating when first opening but the directions were fairly easy to follow. Had a few extra screws in the end but I think they are just backups. Just buy it lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Support and Comfort in one chair!
reviews.reviewText: I cannot brag enough on this gaming chair featuring a headrest, lumbar pillow, and footrest. Sturdy metal legs provide stability against energetic movements. It boasts padded armrests, a wider frame, and premium foam for durability. Easy assembly, easy cleaning with PU leather, and worry-free purchase with free replacement or refund within 30 days and 1-year warranty. This chair also has a massage feature as well.All in all a great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than Expected
reviews.reviewText: I got this chair on sale for $110 (not counting shipping) which I recommend you do.Assembly: It took barely an hour to put together and could’ve honestly been quicker than that had I not been multitasking. It’s incredibly easy/simple to assemble, a child (of good enough strength to tighten the screws and lift the chair) could build this. Despite it’s simplistic construction is feels smooth and sturdy.Experience: initially, it felt cheap. The sides of the backing of the chair feel as though they are lined with pool noodles, which threw me off at first. I was worried the chair was going to be stiff or uncomfortable. However, I was pleasantly surprised! It’s very comfortable to sit in, and the telescoping arms and foot rest are incredibly appreciated. I will say the plastic of the arms feels on the cheaper side and they already seemed a little wobbly shortly after construction. This can likely be amended by tightening the screws. The lumbar support pillow sits a little low for me, so I wish it adjusted to an even higher point, but I will say I am rather curvy so that’s likely a me problem. The headrest pillow is very nice and the backrest reclines and locks well, doesn’t feel wobbly or like it’s going to tip backwards. The chair also sits very low which was wonderful since it fit under my bunk bed, *and* fit my legs comfortably under my desk, which is impressive since most others do not (I have thicker thighs).Summary: I think this chair is definitely one of the best on the market for the price point. It’s not exactly top of the market quality but that’s to be expected for only $110. I would expect slightly better quality if I were paying the full $200 for it, though. Recommended on sale, and especially for those on more of a budget. Exceeded expectation. 8/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my son for Christmas and he was so excited once it was all put together and he realized what an upgrade it was from his last chair. Great size, great quality, looks good and is comfortable. The foot stool option is nice and easy to use, and the vibrating back pillow is just extra for the gamer. Takes a little bit of time to put together but is easy to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO Comfortable and Works for Short People
reviews.reviewText: I'm obsessed with this chair. I was struggling in an old classic black pleather Walmart special before with 2 seat cushions under my rear and a blanket over the back for support. This chair cradles me so well. The lumbar pillow is easily adjusted to where you need it based on what angle or position you desire to sit at. The neck cushion is similarly adjustable, though not as extensively as the lumbar one. The material is soft yet feels sturdy, I got the all light grey one and even with 2 dogs, and "house sweatpants" with dog hair, it remains clean. Hair brushes off easily and a Tide pen is perfect for spot cleaning.The adjustable foot rest is incredible. I can sit with my legs crossed or extended. I'm 5'4" and this seat lowers to the point where I can sit flat footed and in perfect posture. I also have a floor cushion for my own sake because I have a nerve condition. I typically spend HOURS at a time in this chair and I don't have the extreme pain and discomfort one would expect from a typical desk chair. The arm rests are cushioned so well, so propping your forearms or elbows on them is plush and comfortable.Asswmbly was swift and simple, with thorough directions and tools provided. Everything about this chair feels smooth and sturdy. The only thing I haven't tried is the massager in the lumbar cushion, so look to other reviews for that :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite chair!
reviews.reviewText: I got the chair during the Black Friday season for around $100. It was worth every penny. I would have paid full price if I had to. We don’t have the room for an actual recliner, so this doubles as my comfort chair. I’ve fallen asleep in it countless times because it’s so comfortable. The footrest is long enough for tall legs. The back support has a vibrating massager in it which might not seem like much, but the relaxation it provides helps you calm down when your games are about to make you rage! The assembly is simple and easy and all the tools are provided.
robusto ben fatto anche nei particolari

Super facile à monter et très confortable, on peut s’allonger c’est génial, le petit support pour les jambes super pratique et très ergonomique, le pied en metal beaucoup plus solide que les pieds en plastique, le petit coussin massant pour le bas du dos c’est très agréable et la chaise est super belle, pour un prix très abordable je suis très satisfaite

J’ai acheté cette chaise, mais elle s’est mit à grincer après moins d’un mois d’utilisation, les vis de desserrent toute seule malgré le fait que je serre fortement, les coussins sont de mauvaises qualité ils s’écrasent après quelques minute, aucun sensation confortable, je déconseille

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Arrived quickly, carefully packaged, every part separately wrapped to protect it, no damage, small screws nicely labeled and organised in vac wrap sections.Unpacking straightforward, all parts present no sign of any damage.Instructions excellent, truly , usually they are rubbish but these are clear well written easy to follow with helpful images.Took about an hr to put together, given flu and a chest infection I imagine others do it more quickly, feels secure and safe and well made.Spare pieces provided in case of need and don’t ignore the line about retightening screws every 6 months, from experience that’s important.Holds my weight at 220lbs and mechanism to lean back forward works perfectly. Nice bonus didn’t buy this with realising the lumbar cushion massages, that works well too.Appearance looked stylish and padding feels comfortable, easy zip access means padding can be replaced in time if neededAll in all a good investment for one’s comfort for gaming or work from home.
Ottimo materiale, facile da montare, resistente. Per il prezzo mi aspettavo molto meno, ma le mie aspettative sono state di gran lunga soddisfatte.
